name: Caelum: Into the Sky
description: Caelum is a world of many wonders and treasures, in development for the HTC Vive. This world holds many secrets, and some have been unearthed by the events of the past. Some are hidden behind massive doors some behind riddles and puzzles, it is up to you to find your way and snatch up the glory and wealth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: i5 4590 or FX8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 6500 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: These are the tested specs
